â€œI do hope that you will remember my mistake and not repeat it, junior brother.â€

â€œSpeaking of herâ€¦â€

â€œI know, I know. Sheâ€™s why Senior Sister Feng and you became childhood friends, am I right?â€ Lu Yeâ€™s grin widened.

â€œIâ€™m heading out, Yuechan.â€

â€œThe Raving Bladesmen!â€

A beam of light punched into the sky before speeding down a different direction.

Suddenly, Lu Ye received a message from Feng Yuechan. It said, â€œThank you, Junior Brother Lu.â€

Lu Ye smiled. He did not respond to the message.

â€œLu Ye.â€ Yi Yi appeared out of Amberâ€™s body and landed in front of him. She asked curiously, â€œWhy did we come to the Devoted Onesâ€™ Outpost?â€

â€œTo visit our fourth senior brother, of course.â€

â€œThat canâ€™t be right.â€ Yi Yi shook her head. â€œBrother Li had just returned to the sect a month ago, andâ€¦ if you really just came to visit him, you wouldnâ€™t have fought against the Devoted Ones cultivators and strained your relationship with them on purpose. Iâ€™m sure you had something in mind.â€

Behind Lu Ye, Feng Yueâ€™s ears had straightened up in attention as well. She too believed that Lu Ye had come with an anterior motive, though she couldnâ€™t possibly figure out what that might be.

Yi Yi tilted her head. â€œIf I knew, I wouldnâ€™t be asking you, would I?â€

Lu Ye considered his answer for a moment before replying, â€œBrother Liâ€™s Spiritual Point was repaired a while ago, but he hasnâ€™t ascended to the Cloud River Realm.â€

â€œDidnâ€™t you tell me that he needed some time to adapt to his repaired Spiritual Point?â€

â€œSince when do you need time to adapt to a single Spiritual Point, even if it was one that has been damaged for a long time? Plus, Brother Li has been stuck on the Spirit Creek Realm for over a decade. Heâ€™s long since reached the peak a Spirit Creek Realm cultivator could attain. The reason he hasnâ€™t ascended yet was because he was worried for my safety.â€

Lu Yi Ye of the Crimson Blood Sect was the number one enemy of countless Thousand Demon Ridge sects right now. At his current strength, he was untouchable in the Inner Circle and Outer Circle, but he had to enter the Core Circle eventually. Here in the Core Circle, there were countless cultivators who had switched to a Heaven-Grade cultivation technique. Once the news of his arrival had spread, he would face an endless wave of attacks for sure.

The reason Li Baxian hadnâ€™t ascended to the Cloud River Realm was simple. He was worried that Lu Ye might not be able to handle the pressure with just him and his group, which was why he chose to stay and act as his strongest shield.

Lu Ye had figured this out when he had messaged his fourth senior brother and asked him when he was ascending to the Cloud River Realm. That was why he had visited the Devoted Onesâ€™ Outpost. He wanted to persuade his fourth senior brother to change his mind face to face.

He just didnâ€™t expect that the Devoted Onesâ€™ cultivators wouldnâ€™t even carry a message to his fourth senior brother, much less allow him into their Outpost.

Later, Feng Yuechan manipulated her Heaven Nine cultivators into challenging Lu Ye into a duel, proving that the young man was capable of defeating multiple Heaven Nine cultivators even after he had been worn down by the previous battle. Both of them were sure that his fourth senior brother would be convinced of his ability to protect himself after witnessing this.

Yi Yi exclaimed in realization after listening to Lu Yeâ€™s explanation, â€œI see! Butâ€¦ I didnâ€™t hear either of you bring this matter up at all.â€

â€œSome things need not be said to be understood.â€

Lu Ye knew Li Baxian had made up his mind when he declared, â€œIâ€™ll be waiting for you in the Cloud River Battlefield!â€

â€œI donâ€™t want to interrupt, but erâ€¦â€ Feng Yue suddenly interrupted from behind, â€œI noticed a few auras following us for a while now. I thinkâ€¦ I think the enemy has found us.â€

Lu Ye glanced in a certain direction coldly. As she said, a few auras had been trailing him from afar. He immediately turned the Spirit Boat around and flew toward them.

Normally, fliers strove to avoid one another for many reasons. However, these people continued to fly toward them until finally, one of them exclaimed in excitement, â€œIt really is the Vanquisher of Sects!â€

The atmosphere in the Thousand Demon Ridge had been grim and bloodthirsty ever since they suffered that unprecedented humiliation in the Inner Circle. They were all waiting for Lu Ye to enter the Core Circle so they could teach him a lesson he would never forget.

That day had come sooner than expected.

However, the man had just finished his sentence when he abruptly discovered that several flying weapons were flying straight toward him. Despite his best attempts to dodge the surprise attack, he was struck in his vitals and killed without any resistance whatsoever. Blood burst out of his wounds as he fell head first toward the ground.

Yi Yi flew out and swiped the Storage Bag on his waist. She then took his flying Spirit Artifact as well.

When she looked up, it was like the sky was raining blood. Lu Ye had killed all of their pursuers. The last Thousand Demon Ridge cultivator to fall in particular had died with his eyes wide open. He never figured out how the Vanquisher of Sects had killed him, a Heaven Eight cultivator, with just his flying weapons before his consciousness disappeared completely.
